column1: #Text=This column is alarmist in the extreme and also, unfortunately, surprisingly blind to Western excesses.
#Text=Has anything that China has done in the recent past even come anywhere close to the illegality, instability-causing, and sheer assault on international institutions of the US invasion of Iraq?
#Text=So, when the Chinese claim that the West is applying 'double-standards' they are, unquestionably, correct.
#Text=That does not excuse what China is doing in the South China Sea.
#Text=Burton is correct to say that, legally, China has no case and its aggressive response is unproductive.
#Text=But, again, China is simply following in the footsteps of Westerners.
#Text=It is treating the surrounding region as the US has treated Latin America and the Middle East.
#Text=China is actually a far better follower of international law than the US.
#Text=Burton should simply know better than to stir up this kind of jingoistic nonsense.
